revised_title: Anatomy of a Polypus in the Vena Pulmoalis and the Structure of the Pulmonary Vein
tldr: The author describes the removal of a polypus from the Vena Pulmoalis and provides detailed observations on the structure and function of the pulmonary vein. The article also discusses the anatomy of the heart and the role of the pulmonary vein in the circulatory system.
